Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jordaria.event.Event
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DebugMessage, EntityCreated, EntityMove, EntityMoveRequest, Error, EventSystemStarted, GamePaused, GameResumed, GraphicsSystemStarted, HumanViewAttached, MapChanged, PhysicsSystemStarted, ShuttingDown, SoundSystemStarted, Tick

    public abstract class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract event to be extended.
